hopobject.body: I have my own business wew.medishieldlife.sg What the FCA proposes though does meet many of these concerns with a limit on times a loan can be rolled over â the lenders wanted a limit of three, debt charities one, the FCA decided on two â and also there is a curbing of the ability of lenders to automatically take money from borrowers' accounts, something which can really send an individual's finances spiralling. There is also a pledge to monitor firms' advertising and I think this is a crucial area where the FCA can really make a difference. We need an end to promises of quick decisions on loans and the idea that borrowing money can be a fun thing to do. These are only the first steps and they have taken too long, but I believe we are moving in the right direction over payday.
